Header: A Tusker has been shot dead at Udawalawa
Content: A Tusker has been shot dead at Udawalawa National Wildlife Park. The shooting has taken place last night. Wildlife Officials said the deceased Tusker is about 12 years old. Wildlife officials of the Udawalawa National Wildlife Park has commenced investigation into the incident. A team of Veterinary Doctors from Udawalawa Ethathuru Sevana conducted the postmortem.
